oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Photograph of Dr. Edmund Allen Taylor
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Dr. Edmund A. Taylor was a Haywood County doctor who served as needed during the Civil War, often with Maj. Hiram S. Bradford's regiment. He owned the medical kit (hayw035) and died at age 49 in 1869. He was the father of Sarah Madison Taylor Johnson. Bradford was Maj. & Asst. Adj. Gen. of the State of Tenn., and later served Brig. Gen. J. P. McCown.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Taylor, Edmund Allen
